transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji Pappu sir Sandhya bol rahi thi IndiaMART office se senior manager.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji boliye.
Customer: Aapne customer care pe call kara hai. Bataiye kya problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Mam problem ye hai kaam nahi mil raha bilkul bhi lead nahi aa rahi. Chalo kaam to mile na mile par lead to aaye.
Executive: Lead to aap use kar rahe ho na sir. November mein aapne abhi tak 11 lead use kar chuke ho aap.
Customer: Bas 11 lead hi milti hai kya ek mahine mein?
Executive: Sir abhi 11 lead ek mahine mein nahi hai. Aap agar lead check karoge kya problem aa rahi hai lead mein aap batao kahan par kaun sa lead nahi dikh raha hai abhi aapko?
Customer: Lead kal maine laptop pe raha tha main auto refresh option lagaya kar to bhi main continuously nazre gada ke raha tab bhi nahi mil paya.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Tab bhi aapko ek bhi lead nahi dikh rahi hai?
Executive: Nahi dikh raha na aur wo Aman sir unse bhi baat hui thi mam to wo bhi haan haan wo bolte hain TrustSeal karao TrustSeal. Waise hi kaam nahi mam batao kya karu main kaam isme dilao na thoda.
Executive: Sir aapka maine aapko aapko maine Riksha mam ne sabne aapko suno mujhe bhi to business suniye mujhe bhi business karna hai mam to main bhi kya hai aise nahi hu main bhi karaunga par kaam to mile na ek to pehle shadi vagera chal rahe the to main busy tha main lead nahi le pa raha tha.
Customer: Ab main free hua hu to lead dekh raha hu to lead nahi hai us time lead aa rahi thi. yahi to problem hai na jab aap aap free nahi hote ho tab aap matlab aap bilkul use hi nahi karte to aapka preference bhi to kharab hota hai na usse.
Customer: Haan to wahi wahi keh raha hu to suno.
Executive: Aapko to rehta hai ki bola hi gaya tha sir ki aap active rahiye services par ab active to hu main par kya karu aise hi dilchaspi khatam ho jati hai jab dikhta nahi hai kachu.
Executive: Aise nahi hota hai sir aap pata hai bar bar hume call kar dete ho aur aap hume bolte ho ki hume mujhe lead nahi mil raha beech mein to aap bhi to inactive ho jate ho na to aapka purchase pattern kharab ho jata hai.
Customer: Wo kuch nahi hai meri wo kya hai mera bhi man kharab ho jata hai jab kaam nahi chodo chalo ab aise mil raha hai mil hi nahi raha to kya tak laga nahi sir man kharab karke thodi business hota hai achcha aap ek baat batao aapne business start kara hoga kya aap turant hi business aane lag gaya hoga aise nahi hota hai sir.
Executive: Aapko wo use karna padta hai buyer banane padte hain tabhi to ja ke aapka business wapas se start hota hai.
Customer: Ab banao to pehle to issue yahi aa raha hai lead nahi aa raha. Maine to aapko sir refund ka bhi option diya tha do mahine pehle ki aap apna refund le lo aapne tab bhi refund se nahi liya.
Executive: Are wo mujhe refund leke karna kya hai mujhe to kaam karna hai main isliye nahi liya aur aapne bola tha Diwali baad baat karenge. aapke pass mera number tha aap mujhe direct call karte aap kyun IndiaMART pe bar bar call kar dete ho ye bhi to samjho na.
Executive: Main kar raha tha na abhi thodi der pehle to maine uthaya nahi aapne maine ki pata nahi aapne customer care pe call kara tha sir aapne mere number pe baad mein call kar raha hai pehle aapne IndiaMART pe call kar diya.
Customer: Sir main bhi chahti hu aapko business mile. Main bhi chahti hu sir aapko business mile main ye nahi bolungi aapko business nahi mile aap samjho wo cheez hum bhi utna hi concerned hote hain jitna aap concerned hote ho apne services ke liye.
Executive: Nahi to ye mera jo account manager hai wo mere mujhe thik nahi lagta wo wo usko experience to hai nahi koi cheez ka aap mera pehle aapko account manager de rakha hai na bahut achcha account manager de rakha hai are nahi janta wo utna aap se puchega kabhi kisi se wo wo pehle wala tha ek mera ek number aadmi tha wo wo aapki company se promote ho gaya wo wo hai nahi ab nahi kaun kaun Akshay tha Akshay tha.
Customer: Wo chala gaya aapki company se bahut badhiya banda tha wo aap bhi khud samne se call karta rehta tha mere ko.
Executive: Pata nahi aur usko puri knowledge thi wo catalog vagera aapko kitna business mil chuka hai IndiaMART se jab se aapne use karna start kara hai wo batao.
Customer: Hai ji?
Executive: Kitna business bana liya abhi tak aapne aisa to nahi hai sir ki aapne nahi banaya hoga bilkul teen mahine mein kuch to bana hoga na sir.
Customer: Nahi ban payi mam baat wo kya main to mera aur kahin bhi kaam chalta hai main usse gujara kar leta hu.
Executive: Aise thodi hota hai sir. Suno suno mam suno main kya hai main khud hi jo bhagwan god ki murtiya unka shringar karta hu samajh gaye haan jo uska color paint vagera hota hai na shringar wo to main mera khud ka work hai to main kya hai apne maine khud ka shop bhi le rakha hai aur main kisi aur dusre ka kaam bhi kar leta hu udhar se maal jo chhote nag hote hain na do foot tak ke unko main apni dukan pe manga leta hu to unka color paint kar deta hu to usse bhi mera 20 15 20 hazar rupaye nikal jata hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Aur rahi dusri baat main ek facebook page chalata hu aur ek mera youtube channel bhi hai kabhi kabhi unse bhi call aa jati hai mere ko baki IndiaMART se to mam nahi nahi mil paya main sahi bata raha hu aapko.
Executive: To sir ab aap itni bar maine suniye suniye maine pichli bar IndiaMART se kaam nikal gaya tha mera jitna maine diya tha usse thik nikal gaya pichli bar ki baat bata raha hu main jab mere wo wo sir the wo wo khud kaam badhiya dila dete the.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Par abki bar pata nahi usme jab maine pichli bar kara tha na ek mahine baad hi kaam milna start ho gaya tha thik kaam aur main call karta to fir sudhar kar dete pata nahi wo karte hi nahi karte mujhe nahi pata par mera kaam fir chalne lag jata hai isliye main aapko call karta hu maine ki mera abki bar ho jaye ho jaye par abki bar aap jude ho mere se isliye aur ek ye jo jud ke aaya hai manager pata nahi abki bar baat aise ban nahi payi.
Executive: To sir bar bar call karne se thodi sahi ho jata hai services use karne se are chalo mam yaad to kar le hum ab ye batao main koi bar bar call karta hu do mahine baad call kar raha hu to sir Diwali se pehle baat hui thi meri aapse batao aapne sir kal whatsapp pe hello likha tha aap mujhe bol dete ki madam aap mujhe call kar lo aapko customer care pe call karne ki kya zarurat thi wo isliye likha tha mam wo ratri mein mujhe aapki yaad aa gayi maine chalo main kya sare din to busy rehta hu mera main subah 11 11 baje tak IndiaMART pe rehta hu laptop on kar leta hu fir mera channel yaad aayi main kyun na Sandhya mere ko main ab filhal hello kar deta hu baki baad mein jab ek lead kharidi hai Shivling ki Manu Chakravarti ki agar talaqi ispe kya hai abhi aapne jo baat kari hogi kuch to baat kara hoga na ispe usse baat nahi ki waise catalog share karke chhod diya.
Executive: Achcha aur dusra aapne kharida tha marble Dakshina Kali Mata statue ka ye mam pata nahi ye kahan se lead aati hai iska mujhe pata bhi nahi padta ye kahan se aa rahi hai ye mere pass mahine mein ek do bar aati hai pata nahi aur main isko contact karta hu to wo bolte hain humne wo bolte hain humko nahi lena.
Executive: Aur inse baat hui aapki marble puja murti all for all god inse baat hui hai aapki?
Customer: Haan ye ye hui thi ye inko nahi chahiye tha.
Executive: Aise thodi hota hai sir nahi chahiye. Unhone bola tha ki abhi hamara kaam chal raha hai hum baad mein contact karenge to unhone aur red lal pathar Hanuman size 3 feet 68 kg haan inse hui mam baat.
Executive: Inhone kya bola aapko? Inhone abhi koi abhi ye discuss karenge tab jawab denge matlab koi committee ka kaam hai inka achcha achcha haan jaise ek aadmi ka kaam hota wo to khud decision karke de deta hai baki jaise mandir vagera koi murti ka kharidte hain to usme kai bande hote hain na to wo pure decision leke jabhi lete hain committee walon ka kaam hai ye hota hai.
Executive: Main samajh gayi aapki baat. Haan to main raat isliye hello kiya tha kyunki main bhul jata hu din mein kaam rehta hai na to maine ki ab hello kar deta hu aapke pass mera number hai to sir aap mere ko call kar diya karo true caller mein search karke nikala maine aapka naam se nahi nahi save kar lo na sir true caller mein kyun search karte ho aap save kar lo nahi nahi ab kar lunga mam kar lunga par thoda kara do thoda abhi dekho ek aapke pass aa rakhi hai kaam dhinu brass marble mein to nahi deal karte ho na aap brass nahi hu main bhi marble ka kaam hai marble ka oh haan aur thoda jyada karta hu to dust ka dust ka adjust kar sakta hu wo bhi mera khud ka nahi hai wo bhi kisi se leke kar sakte hain ye hai kyunki mera khud ka nahi hai mere jijaji ka kaam hai dust ka to main udhar se kar leta hu uska to chal par ye fiber brass polystyrene resin aapke pass aa rakhi hai dekhiye sir Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj statue 50 piece ka hai ye Nagpur Maharashtra ye kahan dekhna padega mujhe aap buylead mein search karo marble statue rukiye ek minute kam dhenu ka hai dragon marble statue hai aur Chhatrapati Shivaji haan ye hai 18 ghante pehle ka hai dekho haan baat to karo sir abhi karo aap call lagao aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe the person you are speaking with has put your call on hold please stay on the line aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe hello haan mam haan ji sir baat hui wo call nahi le pa rahe fir se mila unse ek bar aur try karta hu haan dobara milaiye sir aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai wo busy hai mam abhi thik hai aap thodi der baad inko baat kariyega fir kyunki kuch log office vagera mein hote hain na to nahi le pate koi baat nahi sir aap thodi der baad baat kariye are mam ruko ruko call aa raha hai unka aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain hello haan sir hum shivam murti art arvo Jaipur Rajasthan se baat kar rahe hain ji to sir requirement hai kya aapka marble statue ke liye kiske liye Chhatrapati Shivaji murti ke liye requirement hai kya aapka nahi nahi nahi requirement nahi hai to sir aapka IndiaMART se aaya tha abhi inquiry aaya unko sir nahi requirement nahi hai nahi nahi nahi nahi chahiye aapko murti thik hai sir okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough leads or work.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with current account manager.

- Frustration due to inactivity affecting lead quality.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead usage and preference settings.

- Executive encouraged active engagement on the platform.

- Executive offered assistance in finding relevant leads.

- Executive provided contact details for direct communication.

- Executive attempted to connect customer with a lead.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try calling the lead later.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, account manager
